column4: im tring to get cedega to run cs at 800x600 but when i altab out it sends gnome desktop it to huge scrolling desktop mode, in #cedega someone said the only way to fix this is to run the game on a different x server than gnome...how would i go about doing this in ubuntu?
ah winrar under wine..is that the only option for a gui unrarer?
i think some people have been running into rar version issues lately. Not sure exactly.
